location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 2568/46 'Details regarding Transfer of U.N.O. Work to Communications & Overseas Dept'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 6; these numbers are written in pencil and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of correspondence between the Government of India, External Affairs Department and the Foreign Office regarding communication protocol between the Government of India and the newly established UNO. [United Nations Office].

name.namePart: Indian Political Service, External Affairs Department
